title: Crazy Cab
summary: Navigate a rogue taxi on an alien planet and avoid all the rocks! A mobile game made with seven others in Unity for a Thoughtworks game jam.
long_summary: Imagine you're a taxi driver, and suddenly you find yourself on an alien planet with no brakes. That's basically what Crazy Cab is! A mobile game made with seven others in Unity for a Thoughtworks game jam.

gallery.caption: Very simple: Just dodge the rocks!
You have to see the game over screen for yourself
